text.10_Chapter, 0_Tosefta: ..Rabbi Akiva says in the name of Rabbi Yehoshua, two people harvesting cucumbers, one harvests and is liable, while the other harvests and is exempt. The one who [gathers the cucumbers through] an act of sorcery is liable, [while] the one who [gathers cucumbers in the natural manner and merely] tricks the eyes is exempt.
text.7_Chapter, 3_Tosefta: ... should a person/adam be overbearing, they say to him, the mosquito preceded you.
text.6_Chapter, 4_Tosefta: ...Hillel the elder expounded seven hermeneutical principles before the elders of Betheira: kal vachomer, gezeirah shavah, shnei kethuvim, kllal ufrat, kayotze bo bemakom acher ("the same applies elsewhere" â€” i.e., binyan av), davar halamed me'inyano (and davar halamed misofo).
